postings.heading: 4 Bedroom Student  Housing for Fall Semester

postings.body:
Greeting and thanks for your interest in Our post :) Super nice bedrooms available with awesome roommates for 1 person but you can have overnight visitors now and then :). When you email us please state the room and date you are interested in and a little about yourself so we can save time and I can give you the exact location and details of the specific room.
We are a community of young professionals, in our 20`s, 30`s and 40`s. Mainly males but also a few females. We are all friends working at Stanford, Google, Optibase, Yahoo. Cisco, eBay, Firefox, Apple, Facebook, Rocketfuel, NASA, IBM, Intel, LinkedIn etc.
We are not an agency or company, just roommates living a healthy lifestyle searching for a happy positive roommate to share our homes with. We offer a very unique living situation in a very positive environment, sharing all common areas, full kitchen and living areas privileges. We share all utilities, rent and housekeeping costs as well as responsibility to organize trips and social events.
Imagine coming home to a clean, peaceful, relaxing environment, having a chat while sharing dinner with like-minded friends and roommates.
If you`re looking for clean, comfortable accommodations, flexible lease terms, added amenities, and super affordable rates you have come to the right place! Whether you are a Silicon Valley entrepreneur, are relocating to start a new job, are in transition, are going through a divorce, are an intern or student, or just need a place to live while you get back on your feet, our homes have the solution for all your needs.
Boutique accommodation complete with life`s little luxuries. A holistic life experience tailored specifically for you. Short or long term fully or semi furnished rooms that allow you to enjoy life. We are committed to ensuring an exceptional, memorable home away from home experience, providing a warm and fun environment.
You can store and cook your own food, eliminating the need for expensive outside dining. Roommates are hand-picked to ensure an ideal living/sharing situation that is suitable for all. Our commitment to innovation depends on everyone being comfortable sharing ideas and opinions. All our homes are exquisitely furnished and have a zen feel to them with a touch of Feng Shui.
Our rooms have beds, queen mattress, dresser, pillows and cushions, matching curtains and bed linen, and candles to give them a very peaceful atmosphere. The bathrooms are also very nicely decorated and include all the necessities and towels. The kitchens are fully equipped and basic cooking and cleaning supplies are provided. Wi-Fi is provided in all rooms and common areas.
Our extra Housekeeping service is offered to ensure your comfort and once more to take care of those details while you focus on what matters most in your life at this time. One day you will lie on your bed and realize that your sheets have been changed and are smelling of nature, your room is organized and cleaned with love.
From the very first moment you arrive at any of our homes you`re welcomed into a sanctuary of tranquility that will embrace and awaken your mind, body and spirit. You will be looking forward to coming home each day!! Our promise to you.
Please no smokers, drug users, party animals, heavy drinkers, drama queens, or MESSY people need to reply, all though, we are open minded and accept people for who they are, we prefer to keep our home free of the above mention.
We welcome vegetarians and vegans but please keep in mind that not all roommates are vegetarian and we do cook and store meat, pots are shared so please note that we do not expect you to change your eating habits to accommodate to us or vice versa.
Currently we are seeking roommates for our spacious 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath with Living/Dining Room Central Heating and Air-conditioning.
All the homes have a no pet, no smoking and 1 person per room policy, if you are a female most likely you will have to share the bathroom with another very respectful male roommate, the pictures are model pictures each room is decorated very similar but the color of the sheets and curtains will change depending on the room.
1350 Single rooms with shared bathroom
1450 Master bedroom with private bathroom
Month to month agreement
500 holding refundable deposit
isidharma006 at gmail.com
Utilities are shared at the end of each month
If any of what I wrote resonate with you and you are interested or have questions please email us. If we are a match you can come over and meet, isidharma006 at gmail best way to reach us is to email us directly so please reply to our personal email and put in the subject happy roommate.
key words: Stanford, google, castro, shoreline, california, palo alto, los altos, santa clara, sunnyvale, San Jose, evergreen, retreat, meditation, yoga, organic, silence, peaceful, serenity. caltrain, light rail, public transportation, whole foods, walmart, temporary, furnish, happy, relaxing, friendly, Nasa, Google, Apple, Intel, IBM, cisco, ebay, yahoo

DESCRIPTION
~Cedar North Laguna~
Nestled among art galleries, boutiques and lush flowering gardens, Cedar North Laguna is an extraordinarily tranquil and serene posh beach villa. Flowering bougainvillea and lush vines surround the corner-lot duplex property, creating a true beach villa feel. Ideally located in the much sought after North Laguna Beach area, the home is within walking distance of world class beaches and the historic Heisler Park. This brand new renovated 1-bedroom 1-bath villa occupies the second floor of the property and comfortably accommodates 4 guests in an idyllic setting. The home is immaculate and boasts stylish modern dÃ©cor with high-end finishes, while still retaining the warmth of a vintage era.
The brand new, top of the line, custom gourmet kitchen is just the right size for cooking up breakfast or dinner and features a convenient circular glass modern dining table across with bar chairs to enjoy your meals and views of the hillside and coastline. Brand new Kitchen Aid stainless steel range, microwave and dishwasher are included as well as a full-size refrigerator. Plenty of natural light flows through the villa and recessed can lighting adds to the ambiance. The cozy living room comes equipped with a very comfortable sofa-sleeper and a 50" Samsung Flat Screen TV and a Sony DVD player. A touch of whimsy will be enjoyed in the room`s coastal dÃ©cor and a sitting area beckons with its warm natural light. Across the room is a striking work desk where guests can enjoy the complimentary wireless access. Acacia wood floors and versatile pattern shells reef, beige brushed limestone floors combine with elegant crown moldings to elevate this beach rental with style, class and flair.
The bedroom features a high quality pillow-topped queen size bed and elegant linens. Lavish window coverings add to the tranquil serene feel of the room, which welcomes quiet slumber. Ample closet space and a flat screen Samsung TV with a Sony DVD player to complete the room. The bathroom features a shower area from the toilet and sink, to maximize flow between these amenities. The Toto toilet and tumbled travertine shower walls employ modern conveniences while the space itself exudes beach Villa-charm.
A lovely outdoor living deck area provides guests with a relaxing space for outside dining or see the natural beauty of Laguna coastline or hillside and nightlights with fresh air throughout the day. Alluring ocean breezes flow through the sun deck with a patio table setting for 4. A private laundry room with storage space is adjacent to the courtyard. Assigned parking space for 1 car. Additional street parking is available. Taking full advantage of the beach-close location, a small sun deck is included on the upstairs deck, where a nice view of the blue Pacific Ocean may be enjoyed.
Cedar North Laguna is a posh and stylish charmer -- the perfect accommodation for a relaxing Laguna Beach vacation.

annotations.source_heading: ***Inman-Harvard Square; Luxury Unit 5 Minutes To Havrard***

postings.heading: Inman-Harvard Square; Luxury Unit 5 Minutes To Havrard

postings.body:
Hello! I am looking to rent out the huge master bedroom (180 sq ft) with equally huge walk-in closet (6`x6`) in a beautiful, sunny and spacious gem of a 2-bedroom Silverlake Craftsman house. Unfurnished and spacious, you could fit *two* queen sized beds in the room and still have space for a dresser and a desk - (though admittedly, that would be a weird choice). Sadly, my current and amazing roommate is moving into a condo she bought, so I am looking to find the right person to take her room.
Reasons to love this house:
- hardwood floors all throughout the house
- huge kitchen with sunny breakfast nook
- lawn out front, fruit trees along the side, Japanese maple out back
- all appliances including new fridge and front loading W/D in the unit (GOLD, let me tell you)
- plenty of storage space
- living with a professional chef (!)
- 75% fully stocked kitchen, but there will be ample room for your stuff, if you have
- A/C units in living room and both bedrooms, as well as ceiling fans
- BBQ out back
- pets most welcome (I do not have any myself, but may pet sit from time to time)
The Neighborhood:
- for those unfamiliar with Silverlake, it is a great area, and a perfect blend of nature, urban, and yes, hipster
- neighbors are great, a good mix of artists and non, families and singles
- very pet friendly area
- very safe at night
- bike-friendly and great hills for hiking/jogging
- a 10 minute walk to Sunset Junction, and all the neat shops, yoga studios, cafes, bars and eateries along Sunset blvd, 15 minute walk to the reservoir, dog park and cafes and shops along Silverlake Blvd.
- farmer`s market within walking distance every Tuesday and Saturday
- one of LA`s best flea markets every second Saturday of the month just down the street
- 6 minute drive to Trader Joe`s and Gelson`s
- 7 minute drive to Los Feliz, 5 minutes to Echo Park, 10 minutes to Hollywood, 12 minutes to DTLA
- easy access to freeways 101, 2 and 5
Parking:
Street parking is unregulated and generally easy but you can rent the house-allocated spot from the landlady for ~$120/mo extra if you really want no-brainer parking
Extras:
- We haven`t really done much with the backyard, front yard or porch, so I`m hoping to find someone excited about helping with planting flowers and a herb garden, regular BBQ-ing and maybe getting some patio furniture.
- The bedroom photos included are of my room, which is the smaller of the two, and has a second door leading to the kitchen (which I feel is mighty appropriate for a chef).
- A good portion of the common area furniture will likely stay, and some will leave with my roommate
About me:
Fun, respectful, professional, responsible and friendly female (30). I like to keep the house warm, welcoming, and well-designed. I am very clean and tidy, though by no means a neat freak. I keep a very busy schedule splitting my time working as an actor, private chef and web designer and developer. I will sometimes work from home, but tend to be out and about pretty often. I`m not a big partier, but I do like to throw the occasional dinner party for friends. Being a chef, I am always cooking and trying out new recipes, so you can expect to get delicious food served to you on a regular basis. :)
About you:
You are clean, employed, friendly, drama-free, and easy going. You are busy with your own life, but are up for the occasional cocktail hour and co-watching an episode of GOT/Scandal/OITNB/Sherlock, etc., from time to time. Open to male or female, and if you have a pet, I will be happy to help out with cuddles, walks, etc.
Available September 1st (flexible). This is a beautiful home in a sought-after area, so it will go fast! Please respond with a bit about yourself, and any links to FaceBook, Twitter, Instagram, as well.

postings.body:
Hello!
I`m excited to find a great roommate to share my 2 bed/2 bath home. Below are some details about me and the place. The listed rent of $2200/mo. is per person. Please feel free to email me if you have any questions. Thank you for your interest!
THE HOUSE:
This newly remodeled condo is located in the beautiful, safe, classic and upscale neighborhood near Upper Market/Castro/Twin Peaks. The home comes with end-to-end hardwood floors, mosaic tiled bathrooms, granite wet bar, wood fireplace, extra-large refrigerator, electric stove, newly installed microwave, GE dishwasher, and central heating. The entire living room wall is floor-to-ceiling windows featuring stunning, panoramic views stretching from San Francisco Financial District and the Bay Bridge across the Bay. The available room has new built-in storage cabinets with floor to ceiling mirrors, so external dresser/wardrobe is optional. You would also have exclusive use of a second bathroom with a tub!
One garage parking spot does come with the home that I occupy, although ample street parking is also available in the neighborhood (no permits needed!). If a designated spot is important to you, I am flexible to work something out. Walking distance to MUNI - Route 33, 37 and 48; very close to Diamond Heights Shopping Center, Castro/Noe Valley, Safeway, Mollie Stone`s, Whole Foods, and to 24th/Mission BART Station, Glen Park BART Station and Hwy 280 (perfect for commuters).
Other Features/Amenities:
Water, garbage and sewerage fees paid by landlord
Large storage room included
Elevator in building
Laundry facility/recycling in building
Shared backyard
ABOUT ME:
Cal grad in my early 30`s working in the Mission District. My friends would describe me as sincere, very responsible, financially stable, independent, nature/animal loving, and a free spirit. I love cooking, lounging, yoga, going out with friends and want the home to be a place of comfort, warmth, laughs, and relaxation. On the weekends, I do enjoy being outdoors i.e. beach and trails and like to stay active.
I am owned by my beloved dog, Mijo. He is well behaved, house trained, and would be a great part-time companion for someone who loves dogs but does not have one to dote on. Unfortunately, I`m allergic to cats (love them) so I will not be able to room with one permanently. We may be open to another dog :).
ABOUT YOU:
I`m seeking a responsible, considerate, personally/financially stable professional. A lover of dogs is a must! Someone who is independent but also enjoys the company of a roommate over great conversation and meals here and there. Sorry, but NO smoking, drugs, or excessive partying in the house (HOA rules).
I would love to hear more about you (please include FB and LinkedIn links if you have them). I plan to contact potential roommates for a meet and greet this week. Available now but early August would be okay too. Thanks and best of luck in your search!
-IL

----------------
Located in Manhattan in near Little Italy. Next to Lower East Side and Chinatown. Walking distance to subway, SoHo, Tribeca, and the East Village.
The Space
1. Private room fully furnished with full size bed and desk, central location in the middle of NYC in Little Italy and walking distance to SOHO, Tribeca, Lower East Side, East Village and West Village.
2. Great eateries in neighborhood.
THE NEIGHBORHOOD
EATERIES:
Restaurants: Fat Radish, Spur Tree (best Jamaican in NYC, oxtail stew voted best new dish in NYC), Cafe Katja (great Austrian meatballs), Barrio Chino (good Mexican), Dudley`s (Aussie brunch spot), Vanessa`s Dumplings (best $1 dumplings)
Coffee Cafes: Grumpys, Pushcart, Roasting Plant (my fave), Lost NYC (Hipster)
NEIGHBORHOOD INFO:
1. Walking distance to SOHO, Tribeca, Lower East Side, East Village and West Village.
2. Amazing dumplings, 5 for $1 (no joke).
3. Walking distance to my two favorite speakeasies/lounges in NYC: Apotheke and Attaboy (where the legendary Milk & Honey used to be).
4. Orchard St. in the LES: Great French press coffee, my favorite Jamaican restaurant in the city, Spur Tree (get the oxtail stew), great Austrian meatballs at Cafe Katja, and just a smorgasbord of eating options.
5. Gallery openings five blocks over that serve free wine every night of the week.
6. Walking distance to Ground Zero and the Freedom Tower
GETTING AROUND:
1. Subway is a 5 minute walk away that takes you anywhere in the City.
2. Bus is 1 block away and takes you anywhere in the City.
